title: Back On
lyrics:
Who would of thought it be like this?
The sample on this beat its so memorizing
Love's a funny thing it's hard to recognize it
I must admit it feel like love when the check deposits
My ex brought to much stress I'm having sex with commas

Don't try to understand me unless you met my momma

This Battles blood is different so don't cause a problem

Got the Yeezy's on our feet to try and show you popping

Yeah I bought em but I ain't wear em cause I know you got em

It ain't finna be nothing like these mini me's

Anti industry, I'm winning off my similies

Every bar [?] like Tennessee

Young Pac Imma ride on my enemies

Niggas better catch up

Can't live a life in hindsight I'm dropping out professor

I don't need your lectures, hope to find my peace in heaven

Was 16 with a weapon, had two tecs might get ejected

Flow is sick as cancer couple days I;ll go get tested

Nah I''m just bullshitting booth with some stool in it

Verse after verse like a church they think I'm pull pitting

We just want to make a living but this ride gonna take a minute

No I.D. said my future bright so I can't wait to get it

I'm plotting for that top spot they gonna hate me in it

Really from the mud I didn't come up in no friendly times

Being broke I'm scared of it, so I spend a penny wise

Clowns couldn't kill me so they dissing bunch of Remy Ma's

Nick Minaj, Drizzy vibes

Just a bunch of frauds living in disguise

It's the Vasi Gang enterprise

Why everytime I hear a beat it sound like dinner time

Why everytime I lace a beat it feel like winter time

Get in line, stand aside it's the plan of God

This the plan of God

Fell off for a minute now we back on

Been working for some years it took em that long

But it made me strong

Yo what y'all hating on?

Fell off for a minute now we back on

Been working for some years it took em that long

But it made me strong

Yo what y'all hating on?

Cause we back on? Now it's back on
